title: O Lord our God, you called our brother St. Peregrine, humble Servant of Mary, to be an outstanding example...

attachments.displayName:
O Lord our God, you called our brother St. Peregrine, humble Servant of Mary, to be an outstanding example of penance and patient suffering. In our own sufferings, we too bring ourselves to the foot of Your cross, asking for mercy and healing. By imitating his virtues and trusting in his prayers, may we too learn to endure the trials of this life with courage and so enter into our heavenly reward with joy. We ask this through Christ our Lord, Amen.

St. Peregrine, pray for us.

object.content:
O Lord our God, you called our brother St. Peregrine, humble Servant of Mary, to be an outstanding example of penance and patient suffering. In our own sufferings, we too bring ourselves to the foot of Your cross, asking for mercy and healing. By imitating his virtues and trusting in his prayers, may we too learn to endure the trials of this life with courage and so enter into our heavenly reward with joy. We ask this through Christ our Lord, Amen.

St. Peregrine, pray for us.
